resources.string: • Classic Mode 1. Open the Schnek app 2. Tap the Classic button 3. Play the game ! 4. (Optional) You could change the control setting by tapping the setting button on the main menu. There’s 2 type of controls that you could choose, Button and Swipe controls. *Game will be over under some conditions. If the snake hit a wall the game will end, and if the snake accidentally eat itself the game will end. • No Walls Mode 1. Open the Schnek app 2. Tap the No Walls button 3. Play the game ! 4. (Optional) ) You could change the control setting by tapping the setting button on the main menu. There’s 2 type of controls that you could choose, Button and Swipe controls. *Game will be over under one condition. If the snake accidentally eat itself the game will end. • Extreme Mode 1. Open the Schnek app 2. Tap the Extreme button 3. Play the game ! 4. (Optional) ) You could change the control setting by tapping the setting button on the main menu. There’s 2 type of controls that you could choose, Button and Swipe controls. *Game will be over under some conditions. If the snake hit a bomb (red) the game will end, and if the snake accidentally eat itself the game will end.
